messages.title: Only A Majority Government Can Get On With The Country’s Priorities
messages.content: At the end of this election, we’ll either get a Conservative majority or a hung parliament.

messages.title: We’ll Get Brexit Done – So We Can Get On With the Country’s Priorities
messages.content: Get Brexit done with a deal – We’ve agreed a deal with the EU. And it’s ready to go from day one of a new parliament. It protects jobs, trade, workers’ rights and environmental standards. And it ends the uncertainty.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: End of the soft prison sentence
Giving the Welsh Government an extra £1.2 billion for our Welsh NHS
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Helping them to cut waiting times and invest in the treatments that matter
Trusting our police with the powers they need to make our streets safer

keyPolicies.policyTitle: More funding for schools across Wales
keyPolicies.policyDescription: So no matter where you live, your child gets the opportunity they deserve

mentions.tacticalSituation: Just a handful of votes could decide this seat. So this election will be very close. And your local vote in Brecon and Radnorshire will make the difference.

issues.brexitEurope: Get Brexit done with a deal – We’ve agreed a deal with the EU. And it’s ready to go from day one of a new parliament. It protects jobs, trade, workers’ rights and environmental standards. And it ends the uncertainty.
issues.education: Making more funding available for schools across Wales – So no matter where you live, your child gets the opportunity they deserve
issues.government: Don’t risk another hung parliament. Secure the majority government our country needs so we can focus on the NHS, police and schools.
issues.health: Giving the Welsh Government an extra £1.2 billion for our Welsh NHS – Helping them to cut waiting times and invest in the treatments that matter
issues.lawCrime: 20,000 extra police officers – and trusting our police with the powers they need to make our streets safer. End of the soft prison sentence

contactInformation.address: CCHQ, 4 Matthew Parker Street, London, SW1H 9HQ

images.caption: Boris Johnson promises a multi-million pound boost to Wales
Conservatives were just nine seats short of a majority
Just a handful of votes could decide this seat
